trans-unit.source: The RecipientInfoCollection class represents a collection of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: RecipientInfoCollection 클래스의 컬렉션을 나타냅니다 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: RecipientInfoCollection implements the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: RecipientInfoCollection 구현 하는 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>인터페이스.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: This class does not have a public constructor; therefore, it cannot be publicly instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 공용 생성자;가 수 없습니다. 따라서 인스턴스화할 수 없습니다 공개적으로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: It is a read-only class accessible from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.RecipientInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 액세스할 수 있는 읽기 전용 클래스는 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.RecipientInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.EnvelopedCms.RecipientInfos%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method copies the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection to an array.
trans-unit.target: CopyTo 메서드 복사본은 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션을 배열에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Array> object to which the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection is to be copied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>개체는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"> </xref> 복사 하는 컬렉션.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` where the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection is copied.
trans-unit.target: 인덱스는&0;부터 시작 `array` 여기서는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션을 복사 합니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the arguments provided to a method was not valid.
trans-unit.target: 메서드에 제공 된 인수 중 하나가 올바르지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: Null 참조를 올바른 인수로 받아들이지 않는 메서드에 전달 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of an argument was outside the allowable range of values as defined by the called method.
trans-unit.target: 인수 값이 호출 된 메서드가 정의 된 대로 값의 허용 범위 밖에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method copies the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection to a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"></xref> array.
trans-unit.target: CopyTo 메서드 복사본은 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션에는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"> </xref> 배열입니다.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"></xref> objects where the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection is to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 배열을 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"> </xref> 개체 위치는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"> </xref> 복사 하는 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` where the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection is copied.
trans-unit.target: 인덱스는&0;부터 시작 `array` 여기서는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션을 복사 합니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the arguments provided to a method was not valid.
trans-unit.target: 메서드에 제공 된 인수 중 하나가 올바르지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: Null 참조를 올바른 인수로 받아들이지 않는 메서드에 전달 되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of an argument was outside the allowable range of values as defined by the called method.
trans-unit.target: 인수 값이 호출 된 메서드가 정의 된 대로 값의 허용 범위 밖에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The Count property retrieves the number of items in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Count 속성에 있는 항목의 수를 검색 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: An int value that represents the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Int 값 컬렉션의 항목 수를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: The GetEnumerator method returns a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoEnumerator"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: GetEnumerator 메서드가 반환 된 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoEnumerator"> </xref> 개체에 대 한는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to enumerate the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoEnumerator"> </xref> 열거를 사용할 수 있는 개체는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: The IsSynchronized property retrieves whether access to the collection is synchronized, or thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 속성 컬렉션에 대 한 액세스 동기화 되어 있는지 여부를 검색 IsSynchronized 또는 스레드로부터 안전 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, which means the collection is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 항상 반환 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, 컬렉션을 의미 하는 스레드로부터 안전 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, which means the collection is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Boolean>값 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, 컬렉션을 의미 하는 스레드로부터 안전 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The Item property retrieves the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"></xref> object at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 항목 속성 검색에서 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"> </xref> 개체 컬렉션에서 지정 된 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: An int value that represents the index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Int 값 컬렉션의 인덱스를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: The index is zero based.
trans-unit.target: 인덱스는&0;부터 시작 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"> </xref> 지정된 된 인덱스에는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of an argument was outside the allowable range of values as defined by the called method.
trans-unit.target: 인수 값이 호출 된 메서드가 정의 된 대로 값의 허용 범위 밖에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The SyncRoot property retrieves an <xref:System.Object> object used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: SyncRoot 속성 검색은 <xref:System.Object>개체에 대 한 액세스를 동기화 하는 데는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> object used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>개체에 대 한 액세스를 동기화 하는 데는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The IEnumerable.GetEnumerator method returns a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoEnumerator"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: IEnumerable.GetEnumerator 메서드는 반환 된 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoEnumerator"> </xref> 개체에 대 한는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to enumerate the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoEnumerator"> </xref> 열거를 사용할 수 있는 개체는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"> </xref> 컬렉션입니다.
